title: Topic 004 Question 027
body: You have a disconnected Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You have a registered app named App1 that has a client ID of 1xxx23x4-5xxx-6x78-90xx-xx12xx345xx.
You plan to assign a role-based access control (RBAC) role to App1.
You need to locate App1 in the Azure Stack Hub user portal by using the search feature.
